title: About
text:
With over 13 years of hands-on experience in the confluence of Software Development and Data Engineering, I specialize in architecting and implementing enterprise-level data platforms designed to manage high-volume, high-velocity data streams.
My focus is on delivering robust data infrastructure that scales with organizational demands, leveraging a comprehensive technical stack.

title: About
text:
1 Core Engineering Proficiencies
Big Data Ecosystems: Expertise in Spark, Hadoop, Databricks, and implementing complex parallel processing frameworks.
Data Pipelines & Streaming: Architecting real-time streaming solutions using Kafka and efficient application development using Java.
Cloud Infrastructure: Building and deploying highly scalable, resilient systems on AWS.
Application Integration: Seamlessly integrating data systems with core business applications to drive operational efficiency.
I am driven by the optimization of data governance practices and the delivery of reliable data infrastructure that directly supports strategic business growth.
